name: Ignota Demo 1
description:
Ignota is a little game I'm working on, this is a really early demo. I'm working on transitions, enemy AI and polishing some art. I might completely go from pixel art to modern HD graphics. But if I am going to change the art style it will still be simple and cartoonish.

There are 2 control "sets" :
If you are using WASD to move (,) is used to attack and (.) is used to dash.
If you are using the arrows to move (X) is used to attack and (Z) is used to dash.
